entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Ingonish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ingonish Beach 11:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.6°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas near noon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High zero.
